document.full_text: valeant pharmaceuticals international inc   is not interested in a bidding war for u.s. drugmaker cephalon inc , and chief executive michael pearson said on wednesday he was willing to walk away.
document.title: valeant to be disciplined in cephalon bid: ceo
lines_and_colors: valeant pharmaceuticals international inc   is not interested in a bidding war for u.s. drugmaker cephalon inc , and chief executive michael pearson said on wednesday he was willing to walk away.
